pddl:
(:event POTIONSTEPONE
    :parameters (?l - liquid ?c - container ?r - room)
    :precondition (and
        (at ?l ?r)
        (at ?c ?r)
        (in ?l ?c)
        (type ?c cauldron)
        (type ?l ectoplasm)
        (cold ?c)
        )
    :effect (and
        (not (at ?l ?r))
        (type liquid1 liquid)
        (at liquid1 ?r)
        (in liquid1 ?c)
        (accessible liquid1)
        )
    )
event_feedback: The {{ l }} swirls in the {{ c }} as it liquefies.

pddl:
(:event POTIONSTEPTWO
    :parameters (?l - liquid ?i - ingredient ?c - container ?r - room)
    :precondition (and
        (at liquid1 ?r)
        (at ?c ?r)
        (at ?i ?r)
        (type ?c cauldron)
        (cold ?c)
        (type ?i nightshade)
        (in ?i ?c)
        (in liquid1 ?c)
        )
    :effect (and
        (not (type liquid1 liquid))
        (not (at liquid1 ?r))
        (not (in liquid1 ?c))
        (not (accessible liquid1))

        (not (at ?i ?r))
        (not (in ?i ?c))
        (not (type ?i nightshade))

        (type liquid2 liquid)
        (at liquid2 ?r)
        (in liquid2 ?c)
        (accessible liquid2)
        )
    )
event_feedback: The {{ i }} is absorbed into the {{ l }} in the {{ c }} with a hiss.
